data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Outgoing Deliveries'
define root view entity zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_deliveries
  as select from    zetr_t_ogdlv                                                   as Main
    left outer join zetr_t_odth                                                    as TransportHeader  on Main.docui = TransportHeader.docui
    left outer join zetr_t_cmpin                                                   as Company          on Company.bukrs = Main.bukrs
    left outer join I_BusinessPartner                                              as Partner          on Partner.BusinessPartner = Main.partner
    left outer join I_DeliveryDocumentTypeText                                     as DeliveryDocType  on  DeliveryDocType.Language             = $session.system_language
                                                                                                       and DeliveryDocType.DeliveryDocumentType = Main.docty
    left outer join I_AccountingDocumentTypeText                                   as AccDocType       on  AccDocType.Language               = $session.system_language
                                                                                                       and AccDocType.AccountingDocumentType = Main.docty
    left outer join zetr_ddl_i_tra_status_codes                                    as TRAStatus        on TRAStatus.StatusCode = Main.radsc
    left outer join I_BusinessUserBasic                                            as BusinessUser     on Main.ernam = BusinessUser.UserID
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZETR_D_STACD' ) as StatusCode       on  StatusCode.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                       and StatusCode.value_low = Main.stacd
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZETR_D_RESST' ) as ResponseCode     on  ResponseCode.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                       and ResponseCode.value_low = Main.resst
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZETR_D_ITMRS' ) as ItemResponseCode on  ItemResponseCode.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                       and ItemResponseCode.value_low = Main.itmrs
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZETR_D_AWTYP' ) as DocumentType     on  DocumentType.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                       and DocumentType.value_low = Main.awtyp
  composition [1..*] of zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_dellogs as _deliveryLogs
  composition [1..*] of zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_delcont as _deliveryContents
  composition [1..*] of zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_deltrns as _deliveryTransporters
  composition [1..1] of zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_deltdat as _deliveryTransportHeader
{
  key Main.docui                                    as DocumentUUID,
      Main.bukrs                                    as CompanyCode,
      Company.sortl                                 as CompanyTitle,
      Main.belnr                                    as DocumentNumber,
      Main.gjahr                                    as FiscalYear,
      Main.awtyp                                    as DocumentType,
      DocumentType.text                             as DocumentTypeText,
      Main.objtype                                  as ObjectType,
      Main.docty                                    as ReferenceDocumentType,
      case Main.awtyp
        when 'LIKP'
             then DeliveryDocType.DeliveryDocumentTypeName
             else AccDocType.AccountingDocumentTypeName
      end                                           as ReferenceDocumentTypeText,
      Main.werks                                    as Plant,
      Main.lgort                                    as StorageLocation,
      Main.umwrk                                    as ReceivingPlant,
      Main.umlgo                                    as ReceivingStorageLocation,
      Main.gsber                                    as BusinessArea,
      Main.bwart                                    as MovementType,
      Main.sobkz                                    as SpecialStockIndicator,
      Main.partner                                  as PartnerNumber,
      Partner.OrganizationBPName1                   as PartnerName,
      Main.taxid                                    as TaxID,
      Main.aliass                                   as Aliass,
      Main.bldat                                    as DocumentDate,
      Main.prfid                                    as ProfileID,
      Main.dlvty                                    as DeliveryType,
      Main.serpr                                    as SerialPrefix,
      Main.xsltt                                    as XSLTTemplate,
      Main.revch                                    as Reversed,
      Main.revdt                                    as ReverseDate,
      Main.archv                                    as Archived,
      Main.pdnum                                    as PrintedDocumentNumber,
      Main.pddat                                    as PrintedDocumentDate,
      Main.prntd                                    as Printed,
      Main.sndus                                    as Sender,
      Main.snddt                                    as SendDate,
      Main.sndtm                                    as SendTime,
      Main.dlvds                                    as DeliveryIDSaved,
      Main.itmcl                                    as CollectItems,
      Main.stacd                                    as StatusCode,
      StatusCode.text                               as StatusCodeText,
      case when Main.resst = '0' then 2
           when Main.resst = 'X' or Main.resst = '2' then 3
           when Main.resst = '1' or Main.resst = 'R' or Main.resst = 'K' or Main.resst = 'G' then 1
           when Main.stacd <> ' ' and Main.stacd <> '2' then 2
           else 0
      end                                           as StatusCriticality,
      cast(
      concat_with_space( StatusCode.text,
                         concat_with_space( case
                                              when ResponseCode.text <> ''
                                                then concat('(',concat(ResponseCode.text,')'))
                                              when ItemResponseCode.text <> ''
                                                then concat('(',concat(ItemResponseCode.text,')'))
                                              else '' end,
                                            case
                                              when Main.staex <> ''
                                                then concat('(',concat(Main.staex,')'))
                                              else '' end,
                                            1 ),
                         1 ) as zetr_e_staex )      as OverallStatus,
      cast( case when Main.stacd = '' or
                      Main.stacd = '2' or
                      Main.rsend = 'X'
                      then 'X'
                      else '' end as zetr_e_tbsnt ) as ToBeSent,
      Main.staex                                    as StatusDetail,
      Main.resst                                    as Response,
      ResponseCode.text                             as ResponseText,
      Main.ruuid                                    as ResponseUUID,
      Main.itmrs                                    as ItemResponse,
      ItemResponseCode.text                         as ItemResponseText,
      Main.radsc                                    as TRAStatusCode,
      TRAStatus.Description                         as TRAStatusCodeText,
      Main.rsend                                    as Resendable,
      Main.dlvii                                    as IntegratorDocumentID,
      Main.envui                                    as EnvelopeUUID,
      Main.dlvui                                    as DeliveryUUID,
      Main.dlvno                                    as DeliveryID,
      Main.dnote                                    as DeliveryNote,
      Main.ernam                                    as CreatedBy,
      BusinessUser.PersonFullName                   as CreatedByName,
      Main.erdat                                    as CreateDate,
      Main.erzet                                    as CreateTime,
      TransportHeader.addat                         as ActualDeliveryDate,
      TransportHeader.adtim                         as ActualDeliveryTime,
      TransportHeader.vhcll                         as VehiclePlate,
      TransportHeader.taxid                         as TransportCompanyTaxID,
      TransportHeader.title                         as TransportCompanyTitle,
      TransportHeader.street                        as DeliveryAddressStreet,
      TransportHeader.bldnm                         as DeliveryAddressBuildingName,
      TransportHeader.bldno                         as DeliveryAddressBuildingNumber,
      TransportHeader.region                        as DeliveryAddressRegion,
      TransportHeader.subdv                         as DeliveryAddressSubdivision,
      TransportHeader.cityn                         as DeliveryAddressCity,
      TransportHeader.country                       as DeliveryAddressCountry,
      TransportHeader.pstcd                         as DeliveryAddressPostalCode,
      TransportHeader.telnm                         as DeliveryAddressTelephone,
      TransportHeader.faxnm                         as DeliveryAddressFax,
      TransportHeader.email                         as DeliveryAddressEMail,
      TransportHeader.website                       as DeliveryAddressWebsite,
      _deliveryTransporters,
      _deliveryTransportHeader,
      _deliveryLogs,
      _deliveryContents
}

"ZETR_T_ODTH",
"ZETR_T_OGDLV"
],
"ASSOCIATED":

"ZETR_DDL_I_OUTGOING_DELLOGS",
"ZETR_DDL_I_OUTGOING_DELTDAT",

],
